clear;clc

A = [0 0;2 0];
B = [2;0];
C = [0 1];

K = [0.707 0.250];
L = [100;50];

kg = 1;

% t = 0:0.01:10;
% r = sin(t);

x0 = [5 -4 0 0];

tspan = [0 10];
[t,x] = ode45(@ODEsystem,tspan,x0);

figure, hold on
plot(t,x(:,1),'b','DisplayName','x_1(t)');
plot(t,x(:,3),'r','DisplayName','guess x_1(t)');
legend('show')
xlabel('Time (s)')
ylabel('State variable')

ha = gca;
box on
grid on
set(ha,'GridLineStyle','--')
print(gcf,'fig1.png','-dpng','-r500');

figure, hold on
plot(t,x(:,2),'b','DisplayName','x_2(t)')
plot(t,x(:,4),'r','DisplayName','guess x_2(t)')
legend('show')
xlabel('Time (s)')
ylabel('State variable')

ha = gca;
box on
grid on
set(ha,'GridLineStyle','--')
print(gcf,'fig2.png','-dpng','-r500');

hold off
\end{verbatim}
